TopicTitle: Getting an RC joystick to work with KSP?

Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone,

I'm trying to get my RC joystick to work with KSP, but no dice so far.  In settings, when I go to assign the axes, it goes unrecognized.  Any thoughts on how I can fix this?

I'm vaguely attached to the idea of a using this RC joystick because I hope to get my kids used to the control configuration.  That way in a couple years when I go buy an RC plane they'll already be familiar with the sticks.

Cheers,

Keith

I'm running KSP on my 2015 MacBook Pro (10.12.5 Sierra).

You can try this mod:

It's not officially updated, but on the last page have a beta release that may work...

I really like the Idea of controlling KSP with an RC Controller. It would make rovers, planes and everything else feel more like toys. 

Unfortunately, I can't help you with this, but I'm very interested in the idea. I guess the main problem is the interface, getting the remote to communicate with the PC Mac?
